amendment.description: An amendment printed in H.Rept. 105-641 to prohibit any funds to be used to implement or enforce Executive Order 13087 of May 28, 1998 or Executive Order 13083 of May 14, 1998.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 252 (Roll No. 398).
